Ratio Description: Peginterferon alfa-2a VERSUS Lamivudine for 5 years IN Patients with chronic hepatitis B in Lithuania
Target Population: Patients with chronic hepatitis B in Lithuania
Title: Cost-effectiveness and cost-utility of the treatment of chronic hepatitis B with peginterferon alfa-2a, interferon alfa, and lamivudine in Lithuania.

Target Population: Patients with chronic hepatitis B in Lithuania
Title: Cost-effectiveness and cost-utility of the treatment of chronic hepatitis B with peginterferon alfa-2a, interferon alfa, and lamivudine in Lithuania.

Ratio Description: Six-month methadone maintenance treatment program VERSUS None IN All opioid-addicted persons visiting the outpatient methadone maintenance program for the first time in Lithuania
Target Population: All opioid-addicted persons visiting the outpatient methadone maintenance program for the first time in Lithuania
Title: Cost-utility analysis of methadone maintenance treatment in Lithuania.
